snippet: Hovnanian Enterprises, the largest homebuilder in New Jersey, reported an unexpected net income of $34.7 million.
abstract: Hovnanian Enterprises, the largest homebuilder in New Jersey, reports unexpected fiscal third-quarter profit of $34.7 million, or 25 cents a share, compared with a loss of $50.9 million, or 47 cents a share, in the year-ago quarter; analysts had been expecting a loss of 14 cents a share; revenue rose 36 percent to $387 million.
lead_paragraph: Hovnanian Enterprises, the largest homebuilder in New Jersey, reported an unexpected net income of $34.7 million.

headline.seo: Hovnanian Profit Unexpectedly Leaps, Bolstering Recovery Signs
